description: Options for aligning small characters to the largest character in the line.

properties.description: Aligns small characters in a line to the large character.
properties.name: ALIGN_BASELINE

properties.description: Aligns small characters in horizontal text to the top of the em box of large characters. In vertical text, aligns characters to the right of the em box.
properties.name: ALIGN_EM_TOP

properties.description: Aligns small characters to the center of the em box of large characters.
properties.name: ALIGN_EM_CENTER

properties.description: Aligns small characters in horizontal text to the bottom of the em box of large characters. In vertical text, aligns characters to the left of the em box.
properties.name: ALIGN_EM_BOTTOM

properties.description: Aligns small characters in horizontal text to the top of the ICF of large characters. In vertical text, aligns characters to the right of the ICF.
properties.name: ALIGN_ICF_TOP

properties.description: Aligns small characters in horizontal text to the bottom of the ICF of large characters. In vertical text, aligns characters to the left of the ICF.
properties.name: ALIGN_ICF_BOTTOM

name: CharacterAlignment
